io.confluent.ksql.serde

Interface SchemaTranslator


  • public interface SchemaTranslator
    Type for converting between ksqlDB and Schema Registry schema types.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String name()
      The name of the Format specification as defined by the Confluent Schema Registry.
      java.util.List<SimpleColumn> toColumns(io.confluent.kafka.schemaregistry.ParsedSchema schema, SerdeFeatures serdeFeatures, boolean isKey)
      Converts the ParsedSchema returned by Confluent Schema Registry into a list of column names and types.
      io.confluent.kafka.schemaregistry.ParsedSchema toParsedSchema(PersistenceSchema schema)
      Converts a PersistenceSchema into a Schema Registry's ParsedSchema.

    • Method Detail

      • name

        java.lang.String name()
        The name of the Format specification as defined by the Confluent Schema Registry.

        This should match the value returned by ParsedSchema.name(). Note that this value is case-sensitive.

        Returns:
        the name of this Format

      • toColumns

        java.util.List<SimpleColumn> toColumns(io.confluent.kafka.schemaregistry.ParsedSchema schema,
                                       SerdeFeatures serdeFeatures,
                                       boolean isKey)
        Converts the ParsedSchema returned by Confluent Schema Registry into a list of column names and types.
        Parameters:
        schema - the ParsedSchema returned from Schema Registry
        serdeFeatures - serde features associated with the request
        isKey - whether the schema being translated is a key schema
        Returns:
        the list of columns the schema defines

      • toParsedSchema

        io.confluent.kafka.schemaregistry.ParsedSchema toParsedSchema(PersistenceSchema schema)
        Converts a PersistenceSchema into a Schema Registry's ParsedSchema.
        Parameters:
        schema - the ksql schema
        Returns:
        the ParsedSchema which will be added to the Schema Registry
